content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It sounds like you're well-prepared for your dinner party. Remember to relax, have fun, and enjoy the company of your friends. Don't stress too much about the details – it's all about creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere for your guests.

If you have any last-minute questions or need any further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you a fantastic dinner party and a wonderful time with your friends!

(And don't forget to take some photos to commemorate the occasion!)
